items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars SHORT/PETITE FRIENDLY !!â™¡
items.body: omg! I normally dont do reviews but let me just say that it is SO hard to find dresses that fit me perfectly because of my size and petite build, but this dress... it honestly exceeded my expectations. I am 4'11 and weigh about 95lbs, and i got a size XS in black. this dress is SO flattering on me, hugs curves so well + its warm! I wasnt expecting it to be warm at all but I wore a shaw with mine and I actually didnt feel uncomfortable being outside in 50F weather. I could've even wore leggings underneath if I wanted to for extra warmth and it wouldve looked fine. the dress didnt scrunch up either when I sat down and got back up. the sleeves r the perfect length + they arent baggy and are fitted to my arms AND THE LENGTH!! omg the length was perfect, its something a very short person like me appreciates for sure! it hit about 1.5 inches above my ankle so I can still wear heels or even boots with it and it would look fine. and I feel like the dress stayed in place on my shoulders and didnt move that much compared to other off the shoulder dresses/tops (then again i didnt really need to lift my arms any and my shoulders are slightly more broader bc i workout) but obviously if you lift your arm up, the sleeve will ride up a bit and youll just have to slightly readjust. as far as the material, its not thick but its not thin, its a nice sweet spot if u want it to be somewhat breathable but still be able to wear it outside in cold weather. i am cold natured and this was fine for me in 50-60F weather + it wasnt sheer at all, its squat proof lol! and i will say, this dress is slightly over my budget, i would even agree that maybe $10 cheaper is appropriate BUT i honestly loved the quality and fit so much that i would buy it again. but overall, very pleased with this dress and will be getting it in the apricot colorway :) Read more
items.author: Gaby Tijerina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: Love the fit and color, very flattering and perfect for my baby shower, the fold over part moved up a bit but overall great dress and very comfortable/stretchy Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy, cute and good quality!
items.body: Great purchase. Good quality and very soft. Iâ€™ve had this dress for over a year and have worn it to weddings and my baby shower. It is super warm. Doesnâ€™t have pockets. But it has a good weight to it. I was worried about it being see through but itâ€™s not. Doesnâ€™t hold wrinkles and is easy to steam or iron. I washed it once and hung it to dry and it worked fine. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, very soft, pink dress
items.body: This was a great fit for my 9 month belly! It was a little awkward from my belly down but maybe because it isnâ€™t a maternity dress :) it was a little wrinkled as well even after a wash. No smell. Very stretchy, and clinged to my body. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Sweater Dress
items.body: I bought this for a wedding while I was pregnant and loved it! Stretched to fit my belly and Iâ€™ve also worn it postpartum. Beautiful light pink with a thick sweater material. I purchased it a size Up from my norm! Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Rolls up at the top
items.body: Very cute. Size down if you want a tighter/compliment your body shape. I got a small 5â€™2 135 and its too big everywhere, not normally my issue. The top part unrolls so u have to keep adjusting it. I never right reviews but i was so dissapointed aftering seeing some good reviews. Read more
items.author: Marie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: This exceeded my expectations! Fit beautifully. Material is soft, not too heavy, not see through either. I have not washed it yet, hopefully it holds its shape. So far a winner! Read more
items.author: Faith Widders

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dress, definitely allow time to steam
items.body: Bought this for my baby shower at 29 weeks pregnant, it was a huge hit. At first out of the bag it looked terrible but after steaming for 20 min, it looked SO good in pictures. Perfect length and was super soft. It got actually kinda warm. Need to find some type of bra underneath, which was the challenging part. Read more
items.author: Seattle Consumer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Off Shoulder is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Off Shoulder is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blackrose, Royalblue, Apricot, Black, Ginger, Coffee, Khakiwhite, Darkgreen, Rosepink, Beige, Teal, Bluewhite, Lakeblue, Dustygreen. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
